title: How to Make Rice Snowballs

steps.headline: Boil the rice in a cup of water and one cup of milk, with a little salt.
steps.description: If the rice is not tender when the milk and water are absorbed, add a little more milk and water.

steps.headline: Add flavor.
steps.description: When the rice is tender, flavor with vanilla.

steps.headline: Form it into balls, or mold it into a compact form with little cups or glasses.
Place these rice balls around the inside of a deep dish.
Fill the dish with a rich soft custard and serve either hot or cold.
